basic.Peptide Name: Bombinin H4  (natural AMPs; UCLL1c; toad, amphibians, XXA, XXD, animals; inactive bombinin H6)
basic.Target Organism: Active against E. coli D21 (LC 4.8 uM) and S. aureus Cowan 1(LC 3.3 uM). Active also against Gram-  Y. pseudotuberculosis YPIII (LC 8.2 uM), P. syringae pv tabaci (8.2 uM), E. agglomerans Bo-1S (11.3 uM), Gram+  B. megaterium Bm11 (0.8 uM), S. lentus (0.60 uM), M. luteus (0.2 uM), fungi C. albicans ATCC 10231 (1.6 uM), C. guiller-mondii (0.7 uM), C. tropicalis (0.6 uM) (Mangoni ML et al. 2007).
